text.config.items-stack-size-config.opti:
The Names of Items to change the Max Stack Size of.
This is the Item's Id, without the 'minecraft:' (or '<modname>:' for mod items),
every _ is replaced with a space and the first letter of each word is capitalized.
Each Item needs to have a matching entry in Max Stack Sizes.

The Max Stack Sizes of each Item in Items.
This should be a positive integer.
The Max Stack Size is applied to the Item in the same place in Items.
